items.name: Butter Burger
items.description: The cottage cheese burger topped with flavored butter directly on the patty.

items.name: Bbq Mushroom Burger
items.description: A smokey vegetarian burger made with mushroom patty, lettuce, onion, and some BBQ sauce.

items.name: Cheese Burger
items.description: The cheeseburger is stuffed with liquid cheese and a slice of cheese is melted over the patty.

items.name: The Amore Special
items.description: A fan favorite from Amore Special is known for its locally sourced vegetables and fresh toppings.

items.name: Cheese Chilli Toast
items.description: Slices of bread topped with cheese (usually Amul cheese) and green chilies for that kick. Veggies like onions, green bell peppers, and green onions are also often added to it

items.name: Cheese Jam
items.description: Just spread jam on bread and bung a piece of cheese on top.

items.name: Avocado Toasties
items.description: Avocado toast is an open sandwich consisting of toasted bread topped with mashed avocado

items.name: Vegetable Toasties
items.description: A toasted bread slice topped with creamy vegetable filling.

items.name: Bun Maska
items.description: The Irani cafés of Mumbai are a unique part of the city's history. Founded about 120 years ago by Zoroastrian and Shia immigrants from Iran.

items.name: Avocado Croissant Sandwich
items.description: The avocado recipe packed with juicy tomatoes, herby pesto, and croissant.

items.name: Croissant Corn Chilli Cheese Sandwich
items.description: The fusion of flaky butter croissant and the flavor of corn, chili, and cheese.

items.name: Mexican Mushroom And Spinach Sandwich
items.description: A Mexican-style sandwich with kidney beans, avocado, chilies, and mushrooms sautéed with garlic and spinach.

items.name: Spicy Paneer Sandwich
items.description: A perfect mouthwatering recipe with paneer, Indian spices, capsicum & sauce, served with potato chips.

items.name: Tandoori Paneer Wrap
items.description: Tandoori paneer, green chutney, and veggie salad wrapped in a tortilla.

items.name: Chimichanga
items.description: A chimichanga is a deep-fried burrito. It's essentially a flour tortilla filled with various ingredients, most commonly rice, beans, cheese, and then deep-fried until crispy.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: The finger chips served with salt.

items.name: Cheese Fries
items.description: The finger chips served with cheese sauce.

items.name: Piri Piri Fries
items.description: The finger chips with a piri piri seasoning.

items.name: Toastada
items.description: A tostada is a flat, crispy corn tortilla that is typically layered with mashed or refried beans, protein, cheese and toppings such as lettuce, tomatoes, salsa and avocado.

items.name: Tacos
items.description: Classic Mexican street food, customizable with various proteins and toppings

items.name: Crispy Canneloni
items.description: A crispy deep-fried cannelloni served with red sauce.

items.name: Mezze Platter
items.description: Inspired by Middle Eastern mezze, this mezze platter features pita, veggies, dips, and more.

items.name: Loaded Nachos
items.description: These classic Tex-Mex nachos are loaded to the max with cheese, refried beans, guacamole, and salsa.

items.name: Cheese Nachos
items.description: A popular Tex-Mex appetizer or snack consisting of tortilla chips topped with melted cheese

items.name: Quesadilla
items.description: Mexican dish consisting of a tortilla that is filled primarily with cheese, spices, and other fillings

items.name: Cheese Fingers
items.description: A type of finger food, usually consisting of cheese coated in breadcrumbs, and often deep-fried or baked.

items.name: Cheese Vada Pav Roll
items.description: The authentic Vada Pav served in another way, filled with cheese sauce.

items.name: Korean Garlic Bread
items.description: It consists of a soft, fluffy bread roll generously stuffed with a luscious cream cheese filling and dipped in a savory garlic butter spread.

items.name: Mexican Hot Pot Rice
items.description: A popular rice recipe made with a combination of mixed vegetable, rice, beans, corn, vegetable stoc.

items.name: Margherita
items.description: A classic Neapolitan pizza featuring simple, high-quality ingredients: fresh mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and extra virgin olive oil.

items.name: Farm Fresh Pizza
items.description: Typically emphasizes the use of fresh, high-quality ingredients, often locally sourced.

items.name: Cinque Funghi
items.description: Tomato, mozzarella, and mixed mushrooms.

items.name: Spinach E Pinoli
items.description: Tomato, mozzarella, spinach, mixed nuts, and red capsicum.

items.name: The Devil Pizza
items.description: Pizza topped with onion, capsicum, red paprika, spicy cottage cheese per peri and devils spiced sauce.

items.name: Noci E Ananas
items.description: Tomato, mozzarella, Grana Padano, pineapple, nuts, honey & basil.

items.name: Verdure Grigliate
items.description: Tomato, mozzarella, grilled onion slices, grilled green capsicum, grilled mushroom, and caramelized apple.

items.name: Quattro Formaggi
items.description: A pizza topped with a combination of four different types of cheese, often including mozzarella, Parmesan, Gorgonzola, and sometimes Fontina or other flavorful cheeses.

items.name: Rigatoni Gratinati
items.description: With Napoletana sauce, covered with grilled cheese.

items.name: Verde Lasagna
items.description: Spinach, exotic vegetables, and tomato sauce.

items.name: Fussili Pesto Verde
items.description: Fusilli pasta tossed in traditional pesto sauce.

items.name: Penne Alfredo
items.description: Penne pasta in white sauce and exotic vegetables.

items.name: Spaghetti Aglio - E - Olio
items.description: Spaghetti tossed in traditional Agio e Olio sauce.

items.name: Mac & Cheese With Pineapple
items.description: Macaroni pasta served with pineapple in white sauce.

items.name: Penne Arrabiata
items.description: Arrabiata sauce, which translate to angry sauce in italian, and it is a spicy.

items.name: Meditarian Bowl
items.description: The Mediterranean bowl features crispy roasted chickpeas served over fresh lettuce and veggies with fluffy quinoa, all topped with creamy hummus.

items.name: Burrito Bowl
items.description: Loaded with rice, black beans, Pico de Gallo, fajita veggies, corn, and lettuce.

items.name: Italian Bowl
items.description: Dig into all the best flavors of Italy with this healthy, vegan Italian Bowl with roasted vegetables and quinoa.

items.name: Mexican Sizzler
items.description: Mexican rice, Bean patty, Bean curry, Sauté sweet corn, salsa, sour cream, Fajita tossed vegetables

items.name: Italian Sizzler
items.description: Herbs pesto rice, arabiata pasta, Sauteed Veggies, Potato Chips, Garlic Bread

items.name: Arabic Sizzler
items.description: Arabic tomato rice, falafel Tikki, vegetable ball in Tremenda sauce, lavash bread, tabbouleh, and tzatziki dip.

items.name: Amore Special Sizzler
items.description: Pepper mushroom rice, stuffed grilled cottage cheese, creamy veggies, Potato wedges topped with smoked BBQ sauce

items.name: Brownie Cheese Cake
items.description: A dessert that combines a fudgy brownie base with a creamy cheese cake filling

items.name: Banana Nutella Croissant
items.description: Flaky, buttery pastries filled with luscious Nutella spread and sweet, caramelized banana slices

items.name: Gulab Jamun Cheese Cake
items.description: A fusion dessert that combines the flavors of the classic Indian sweet, Gulab jamun, with the richness of a cheesecake.

items.name: Croissant Tiramisu
items.description: The buttery, flaky texture of a classic croissant with the rich, creamy, and coffee-infused flavors of tiramisu.

items.name: Red Velvet Cheese Cake
items.description: It is a four layered dessert with two layers of red velvet cake and creamy cheesecake, all covered in creamy cheese icing.
